configuration.label: Hostname
configuration.description: The hostname or IP address use to connect to the target API.

configuration.label: Port
configuration.description: The port used to connect to the target API.

configuration.label: Connection Timeout (s)
configuration.description: The maximum number of seconds to wait for a response from the endpoint.

configuration.label: Max Concurrent Requests
configuration.description: The maximum number of requests that can be run simultaneously.

configuration.label: Maximum Retries
configuration.description: The maximum number of times a call to an edpoint will be retried if it fails.

configuration.label: SSL
configuration.description: The SSL mode to use when connecting to the target. Can be configured without SSL (No SSL), to use SSL, but do not verify the target's certificate (No Verify), or to use SSL and verify the target's certificate (Verify).

configuration.label: Minimum VMware Aria Operations Severity
configuration.description: The minimum event severity to collect.
